titles.title: His Grace Is Sufficient For Me

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 c1 c3

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Many times I'm tried and tested as I travel day by day
Oft I meet with pain and sorrow
And there's trouble in the way

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
But I have the sweet assurance that my soul the Lord will lead
And in Him there is strength for ev'ry need

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Oh, His grace is sufficient for me
And His love is abundant and free

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
And what joy fills my soul just to know, just to know
That His grace is sufficient for me

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
When the tempter brings confusion and I don't know what to do
On my knees I turn to Jesus
For I know He'll see me through

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Then despair is changed to vict'ry
Every doubt just melts away
And in Him there is hope for ev'ry day

verse.name: c3a
verse.lines:
Oh, His grace is sufficient for me
And His love is abundant and free
And what joy fills my soul just to know, just to know

verse.name: c3b
verse.lines:
That His grace is sufficient for me
And what joy fills my soul just to know, just to know
That His grace is sufficient for me
